entries.title_d: The continual tension between A'Lerris' miners and the Zynt'aia Order centers around a sphere of obsidian. Granted, this

is none other than a misplaced asteroid, rumored to hold high concentrations of rare and valuable resources. How did it get here? Why must a war, a fight, be the knee-jerk reaction to settle conflicts? Within the smooth, reflectant facets of the ebon asteroid, one can feel a tug at the soul, making the onlooker wonder if there's something... darker inside. Perhaps it is only a mirror, a glassy surface only meant to show us what lies within our very selves.
entries.title: Tatoo System: That Word We Call
entries.thanks_3: Ugh. I can't *wait* to go home after this.
entries.thanks_2: I hope you're going to pay for the repairs I need!!
entries.thanks_1: That was a little close. If you hadn't been here, I'd be toast!
entries.taunt_3: I'm going to defend this freighter with my life! But you'll be the first to die!
entries.taunt_1: Stop! You're flying in hostile air space, pilot! We have no choice but to open fire!
entries.target_disabled: The Zynt'aia freighter has been disabled. Waste no time getting close to it while trying to defend it from incoming attacks. We're counting on you, pilot.
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast1 A'Lerris Verata:\#pcontrast3 < Pilot! You're breaking up over here! You need to...transmission point...stop Zynt'aia from calling...reinforcments. Stop signal at...costs.[Transmission Ends] >
entries.recovery_success: I'm extremely impressed with your performance, pilot. Not only did you willingly face danger, but you also excelled in the task given! Come home, pilot. You deserve a celebration thrown in your name.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once I have disabled the freighter, I must hover close to it. Soon, it will be infiltrated by allies which will follow to me safety.
entries.quest_location_d: I need to travel to the Tatoo System, if I'm not there already.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once I have disabled and recovered the freighter, I must escort it safely back to home base.
entries.quest_disable_d: By selecting the freighter's engines or reactor, I can disable the target effortlessly and continue the steps needed to capture the freighter for A'Lerris. (Target the engine or reactor by using the [] keys).
entries.panic_3: Please help us! We're getting toasted over here!
entries.panic_1: We'll need you now more than ever, pilot! We've got enemies on our tail!
entries.failed_escape: Pilot! You've failed us! The Zynt'aia freighter has escaped!
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot! You've failed us! The Zynt'aia freighter was destroyed!
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast1 A'Lerris Verata:\#pcontrast3 < We're getting closer to our goal. The freighter's escort has been completely wiped out! >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast1 A'Lerris Verata:\#pcontrast3 < You've destroyed an enemy ship, pilot! You have %DI enemies left to destroy. >
entries.complete: Good work, pilot. Your mission is a success!
entries.capture_started: \#pcontrast1 A'Lerris Verata:\#pcontrast3 < So far so good. Stay on this freighter until the capture process is completed. I'll keep a look out for any attacks coming in. >
entries.capture_phase_2: You may have gotten lucky this time, pilot! The Zynt'aia Order will find you!
entries.capture_complete: \#pcontrast1 A'Lerris Verata:\#pcontrast3 < Good work, pilot. You were able to capture the Zynt'aia freighter flawlessly! Now escort her to safety. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: Ahh! The freighter. Pilot, you know what to do. We're with you every step of the way.
entries.arrival_phase_1: The Zynt'aia Order's mining freighter is almost in our grasp, pilot. We're counting on you to capture it and guide it to home base.
entries.abort: We're almost home, pilot! Don't quit on us! We still need your help!
